title: Hybrid 360 Digital Watch Face
summary: The digital watch face design for Moto 360 and round shape android smart watch.
developerAddress: 119 BIS Building Room 2D23, Floor 2 Phase 3, Mahesak Rd, Suriyawong, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500 Thailand
description: This Digital Watch Face is designed for Moto 360 (Android Wear).100% compatible with LG G Watch R and LG Watch UrbaneCompatible with Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, and basically every watch using android wear round shape.Note:Does NOT work on Samsung Gear and Smart watches using other operating systems.Features:✔ Moto 360 text✔ Time✔ Date✔ Month✔ Year✔ Watch battery indicator✔ Phone battery indicator✔ Weather✔ TemperatureSettings:✔ Custom color configuration✔ Custom seconds settings✔ Custom date, month, year format✔ Celsius and Fahrenheit support✔ 12 or 24 hour watch display✔ Roller moving animated✔ Show/Hide Moto 360 textSettings: Temperature Unit- °F (Fahrenheit)- °C (Celsius)Settings: Date Format- DD-MM-YY- MM-DD-YY- YY-MM-DDSettings: Time format- 12H- 24HINSTALLATION:- After installing the app on your phone, then you will see Hybrid 360 Digital watch face in the app "Android Wear".- Please activate it from your Smart watch by Long press on the clock then select the Hybrid 360 Digital watch face.Tip:Don't worried about the remaining battery with real time battery life indicator.If phone battery indicator is not update please try to manual activate by update weather on the phone just one time.Please Note* HYBRID 360 DIGITAL WATCH MAKES NO GUARANTEE OF VALIDITY OF WEATHER.* PLEASE KEEP ENABLE LOCATION AND ONLINE TO GET THE REAL TIME WEATHER.* If you don't like this watch face please cancel your order in 15 minutes. * IF you don't want to get notice about new watch face and new apps   please deselect "Notification for new watch face"Have an any idea to improve the watch face app? descriptionHTML:
This Digital Watch Face is designed for Moto 360 (Android Wear).

100% compatible with LG G Watch R and LG Watch Urbane
Compatible with Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, and basically every watch using android wear round shape.

Note:
Does NOT work on Samsung Gear and Smart watches using other operating systems.

Features:
✔ Moto 360 text
✔ Time
✔ Date
✔ Month
✔ Year
✔ Watch battery indicator
✔ Phone battery indicator
✔ Weather
✔ Temperature

Settings:
✔ Custom color configuration
✔ Custom seconds settings
✔ Custom date, month, year format
✔ Celsius and Fahrenheit support
✔ 12 or 24 hour watch display
✔ Roller moving animated
✔ Show/Hide Moto 360 text

Settings: Temperature Unit
- °F (Fahrenheit)
- °C (Celsius)

Settings: Date Format
- DD-MM-YY
- MM-DD-YY
- YY-MM-DD

Settings: Time format
- 12H
- 24H

INSTALLATION:
- After installing the app on your phone, then you will see Hybrid 360 Digital watch face in the app "Android Wear".
- Please activate it from your Smart watch by Long press on the clock then select the Hybrid 360 Digital watch face.

Tip:
Don't worried about the remaining battery with real time battery life indicator.
If phone battery indicator is not update please try to manual activate by update weather on the phone just one time.

Please Note
* HYBRID 360 DIGITAL WATCH MAKES NO GUARANTEE OF VALIDITY OF WEATHER.
* PLEASE KEEP ENABLE LOCATION AND ONLINE TO GET THE REAL TIME WEATHER.
* If you don't like this watch face please cancel your order in 15 minutes.
* IF you don't want to get notice about new watch face and new apps
please deselect "Notification for new watch face"

Have an any idea to improve the watch face app? Let us know by write review and we'll do our best to make this app better.
Discuss with your idea at https://www.facebook.com/siamcybersoft

[NOTICE]
If you have a question, fill free to contact our email address in English.
Email support on: http://apps.siamcybersoft.com

Credits :
Pretty good music background : http://www.orangefreesounds.com
comments: Was Awesome But now the app keeps crashing doesn't update weather and doesn't show current phone battery correctly I'm using a pixel xl on 7.1
Beautiful, stable and most importantly, it works! Finally, a digital watch face that actually works! Would love it if Dev would make the wordings 'moto 360' customizable.
Just what I was looking for, but... The app refuses to update weather and phone battery life unless I do so manually.
Better then my GShock. Same style only better! Thanks

Nice face When I change the color of the watch face from the watch, the change doesn't stick -- after the screen turns off, the face reverts to its default color. Otherwise, it looks good on my LG Urbane.
Looks nice but out of sync All the icons are off place on moto360
